page.title: 12Sport and Recreation
page.content: Dorchester has no public{swimming {pool}but Castlefield School's pool is open to the public two evenings a week, weekends and holidays. Swimming lessons are available. The{Rugby Club}has 120 members, the yearly fee is Â£7.00. Training sessions are on Tuesdays and Thursdays in the season. Nine members play for Dorset. The{Soccer Club}has its pitches next to the Rugby Club. Their annual fee is also Â£7.00. The pitches may be used by members and affiliated clubs. The{Cricket Club's}ground is now being made up to county standard. There are many county players who train frequently at the ground. The{Tennis and Squash Club}is situated beside the cricket ground. The junior fee is Â£11.00 per year. Junior members may train every afternoon and at weekends.
